item.title: Arthur Hayes Wallet Activity Puts Limitless Token Back On Breakout Radar
item.description: The audit report shows the token has a score of 5.5, indicating a “Stay Cautious” stance.

item.title: Crypto’s CLARITY Act Heads To Senate Next Week – But Wall Street Braces For Longer Road Ahead
item.description: Analysts at TD Cowen warned that political incentives could delay the final crypto market structure rules until 2029.

item.title: MSTR Avoids MSCI Exclusion, But Critics Warn That Risks Remain
item.description: MSCI’s decision freezes index exposure for DATs, limiting future passive demand tied to new share issuance.

item.title: Bitcoin, Gold Start 2026 Higher, But Analysts Say The Rally Is ‘A Simple Coincidence’
item.description: According to analysts, Bitcoin's rise is driven by new ETF inflows, exchange outflows, and a growing stablecoin supply.
